DOC.brief_summary: This study compare efficacy , term complete response overall survival , inotuzumab ozogamicin versus investigator 's choice chemotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of Inotuzumab Ozogamicin Versus Investigator 's Choice Of Chemotherapy In Patients With Relapsed Or Refractory Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia
DOC.criteria: CD22 expression Adequate liver renal function Isolated extramedullary disease Active Central Nervous System [ CNS ] disease
